title: Cusco
description: The ancient capital of the Inca Empire, Cusco is a living museum where colonial architecture sits atop Inca foundations. This UNESCO World Heritage site serves as the gateway to Machu Picchu and the Sacred Valley.

practical_info.getting_there: Cusco airport (CUZ) with flights from Lima and other major cities
practical_info.accommodation: Wide range from hostels to luxury hotels
practical_info.altitude_tips: Take it easy first 1-2 days, drink coca tea, stay hydrated
